comments_since_last_sample.body:
As a reminder, this subreddit [is for civil discussion.](/r/politics/wiki/index#wiki_be_civil)

In general, be courteous to others. Debate/discuss/argue the merits of ideas, don't attack people. Personal insults, shill or troll accusations, hate speech, any suggestion or support of harm, violence, or death, and other rule violations can result in a permanent ban. 

If you see comments in violation of our rules, please report them.

 For those who have questions regarding any media outlets being posted on this subreddit, please click [here](https://www.reddit.com/r/politics/wiki/approveddomainslist) to review our details as to our approved domains list and outlet criteria.

***


*I am a bot, and this action was performed automatically. Please [contact the moderators of this subreddit](/message/compose/?to=/r/politics) if you have any questions or concerns.*
IE, since the soft coup didn't work, Trump has no other choice than to steal power via deranged terrorists.
“See, look what you made me do. Do you think I LIKE hitting you?” Vibes from that title
When adhering to the Constitution causes a riot.
United Red States Dictatorship Of America

I wish Democrats had the balls to keep this narrative going, the idea that the vice president can unilaterally choose the president. Imagine the fucking head explosions if VP Harris tweeted daily about her right to disregard votes.
"You failed to overthrow Democracy, so my brown shirts tried to give you a hand. And a rope."

I still think it was pre-planned in some way.  I'm suspecting Trump (or at least his advisory or even legal team) had contingency plan after contingency plan for a variety of legal and political strategies.
If Pence had actually done that shit there would have been much more than a riot. Did they think everyone was gonna be fine with them *actually* stealing the election?

“In two legal memos” he described how Pence could steal the election. 

Correction: in two illegal memos, he did that. Treason and sedition are illegal. Plotting to undermine the Constitution of the United States is treasonous and seditious.

So, when he smacked his kids, did he tell them they made him do it? 

Same principal: I behave badly, it’s your fault.
"The ‘siege’ is because YOU and your boss did not do what was necessary," John Eastman emailed Pence's aide as rioters barged through the Capitol.
This is a practicing lawyer here, that thinks the vice president decides who is president. Mk

"If they hadn't a done what I told them not to do they would still be alive." - Mr. Blonde, Reservoir Dogs

And also, Trump, had the insurrection succeeded.
"It's your fault - you made me hit you!"

Insurrection*

Those traitors built a fucking gallows on the steps of the Capitol and tried to kidnap members of Congress.

Do not let them downplay this. Correct them every single time they try to whitewash the Insurrection.
“Mike, your refusal to let a seditious mob lynch you on the House floor caused all the problems.”
